caption.p: comparison of agricultural adaptation modelling challenge themes, themes drawn from Adger et al. (2018) (See S2.1 for description of themes), CC adaptation challenges previously identified for grassland and for animal health modellers, and broader climate-related challenges identified for these modelling disciplines. The Adger et al. (2018) theme ‘Developing new CCRA methods’ is not included in the table as it would associate with all themes within the ‘Capacity’ category in the current study.
